divs: Sighting Detailsme and my hunting buddy were going in field to hunt deer about 6 am to630 am walking west to east when we saw a vary brite light eastern sky it was moving in a upward motion the light was so bright we didnt know what it might be. the light stop't moveing up; leveld off and flew northeast for a few minutes.there was very little clowd cover, but there was a small clowd in the path of the light,the light whent behind the clowd and almost like the light shut off it was not there anymore. you could see something in front of the light oval shape, my buddy and i did video a few minutes,we were dumfounded not ever seeing anything like that before. we have showed many peapal, some say it was a meter but most dont have an anser what it might be.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ubly
This sighting has never been favorited.
